NOTE_UPDATE_LIMITATION: Only certain aspects of a question can be updated once it's created. To change the question type, delete or hide the question and create a new one.
INTRO_TEXT: To create a question, first we have to pick the question type, which determines how it will be presented.
INTRO_NAME_TEXT: Also pick a name that can be used to refer to the question internally.
NOSCRIPT_WARNING: This page requires JavaScript to work properly.
HELP_INTERNAL_NAME: Respondents will not see this name. It is for internal and reporting use only.
HELP_REPORTING_ORDER: Defines the ordering of questions in reports.
HELP_SUMMARY_LABEL: Displayed in summary widgets. Example: "Overall Rating"
HELP_HELP_TEXT: An optional help text shown to the user.
PLACEHOLDER_NUM_STARS: How many stars should we show?
HELP_NUM_STARS: For example, should the response be out of five or ten stars?
NOSCRIPT_SUB_QUESTIONS: Please enable JavaScript to edit sub questions.
MESSAGE_ADD_QUESTIONS_FIRST: Add other questions first to add as Sub Questions.
